entry.content:
Deprecated: array_key_exists(): Using array_key_exists() on objects is deprecated. Use isset() or property_exists() instead in /Users/fatmac/Sites/owielanctot.com/vendor/twig/twig/src/Extension/CoreExtension.php on line 1592

Textile support was added on November 26th, 2012. Markdown is great, but so is choice. More converters for all!

In honor of this milestone, this post is written in Textile.
